item.description:
Going to see Terry Gilliam's Brazil http://www.meetup.com... ? Why not drop in and grab a bite at Uno's Chicago Grill in Harvard Square, right next to The Garage? I've made a reservation for twenty people. If it looks like more wish to come, I'll see if I can change the reservation.

The reservation is under the name "T.J. Maher" and "Nerd Fun", and is for 6:15 pm. I was thinking we could leave the restaurant by 7:30 pm or 7:40 pm and walk over to the Brattle to grab seats. Can't make it exactly at 6:15 pm? They said it is no problem and can direct you to our table if you can't come until later.

Location: Uno's Chicago Grill
Address: 22 JFK Street, Cambridge, MA
Phone: 617-497-1530

Menu: http://202.unotogo.co...

... the server mentioned that if we want, we can call ahead and order some appetizers over the phone so they are ready for us by 6:15 pm. ... two orders of Muchos Nachos and an order of Boneless Buffalo Wings, anyone? [ Link: http://202.unotogo.co... ].

About Uno's:
http://www.unos.com/g...

"From a single pizzeria in 1943 on the corner of Ohio and Wabash in downtown Chicago, Uno has become legendary for an amazing variety of food, handmade dough (crafted on-site daily), and a unique, welcoming atmosphere. Nothing fake, nothing too fancy, just great American food.

"We invite you to sit back, relax and let us take care of you. Enjoy Certified Angus Beef Â®, tempting new creations like Chicken Milanese and Spicy Chicken Flatbread, or any of our famous Deep Dish Pizzas, which we originated. The taste of Uno is always THE ONE".
item.name: Dinner @ Uno's Chicago Grill before Brazil at the Brattle
